attributes.title: app ran by a racist 😤😤
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what Trump 2020 is all about but my notifications were soon flooded with messages promoting racism, sexism, xenophobia, islamophobia, homophobia, transphobia, and general hate. Don’t get this app and definitely don’t vote trump if you have any morals whatsoever.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS DANGEROUS
attributes.review: Fellow Trump supporters: I understand your urge to support our great racist presidents app, but I beg you not to download this app. Rumor has it that Trump will be sending all of your information from you phone to foreign intelligence agencies through this app. Once again I URGE YOU NOT TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP. IT IS TOO DANGEROUS FOR OUR PRECIOUS PRIVACY. Trump 2020 🤢🤮
